description.narrative: National partners have enhanced capacities to ensure that national social protection system provides appropriate response to vulnerable children's needs., which contributes to Economic And Social Policy General, Social Protection, Social Protection (Covid), Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, child poverty and well-being are regularly monitored, and social policies, especially social protection systems, are strengthened to favour the social inclusion of vulnerable girls and boys at the national and decentralized levels.

mailing-address.narrative: 1 Rue Bani Bouayach Angle Avenue Mohammed VI Souissi Rabat

sector.narrative: Cash Transfers: Technical support to government cash transfer system development and expansion (design, targeting, beneficiary selection, grievance mechanism, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
National social protection strategies: Policies, strategies, legislation and coordination (inter-ministerial, donor)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National partners have enhanced capacities to ensure that national social protection system provides appropriate response to vulnerable children’s needs.

description.narrative: A great step towards the reduction of child poverty and inequality was achieved in Morocco in 2019 with the support of UNICEF Morocco, as a child-sensitive Integrated Public Policy for Social Protection (PPIPS 2020-2030) was adopted by the Government. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2020

title.narrative: (SI Deactiveted) Data on impact or effectivness of social protection on at least one child related outcome (social and/or emergency) is available
Existance of harmonized social protection programme targeting vulnerable children
2.2 Policy/Strategy: Existence of valid national social protection strategy and/or policy
2.4 Coordination: Coordination mechanisms for social protection systems established countrywide
